item.description:
Spot Pond Adventure

Sunday, July 22nd

10:30 to 2

 

 

 

Event: 3 hours of casual kayaking that will include a ½ hr break for some lunch part way through the paddling.  I have been told that Spot Pond has smooth water and is large enough for us to easily enjoy a couple hour of kayaking, it even has an island that we will make a visit to.

 

 People who have taken advantage of the Groupon offer can share their cost and the time with others who didn’t sign up for the discount (Boating in Boston has informed me that the hours must be used at one time but they can be shared with others).  Plans are underway for a 2nd Mosaic event (hike or a bike ride) at the Spot Pond Reservation for the same day so that people will be able to attend as well and we will keep you informed.

 

Trip’s Coordinator: David G

Meet: 10:30 at the Spot Pond Boating Center on Woodland ave beyond the Stone Zoo. Bring something with you to eat and drink.  Personal Flotation Devices will be provided with the rentals and it will be a requirement to where them.

RSVP: Use the Meetup rsvp to respond if you are coming

Cost: kayak rentals are $15 hr and rentals are the only kayaks that can be used on Spot Pond.  And $5 which can be credited to a full Mosaic membership of $25
item.how_to_find_us: Look for David at the Boating Center with a Mosaic Cap

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Kayaking on Spot Pond
